thread.title: Ahead of March Madness: What You Need to Know

author: Andrew Beaton
title: Ahead of March Madness: What You Need to Know
text:
The college basketball season usually begins with merry festivities called Midnight Madness where teams across the country hold an open practice, parade their best players and celebrate the start of a new season that wonâ€™t end for another six months.
Then there was this year.
Before this season began in earnest, the sport was stripped of...
